entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: gilderoy lockhart
entities.description: A wizard who is also a teacher at Hogwarts, known for his arrogance and lack of magical ability.

entities.name: colin creevey
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who seems to have memorized Harry's timetable and often tries to talk to him.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, who is angry with him about a disastrous car journey.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's best friends and classmates at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's best friends and classmates at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts who is also a half-giant.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: A tiny old wizard and the Charms teacher at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Harry tries to avoid Gilderoy Lockhart whenever he sees him coming down a corridor.
Colin Creevey often tries to talk to Harry, saying 'All right, Harry?' several times a day.
Hedwig is angry with Harry about the disastrous car journey.
Ron's wand shoots out of his hand and hits Professor Flitwick squarely between the eyes, creating a large, throbbing green boil.
Harry is friends with Ron and they are planning to visit Hagrid together.
